sentences.sContent: On the basis of minimax algebra theory, this paper provides an algebra method of solving countable stages decision problems in the dynamic programming.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the basis of minimax algebra theory, this paper provides an algebra method of solving countable stages decision problems in the dynamic programming.
sentences.sCn: 本文根据极大极小代数理论，给出了一种用以求解动态规划中有限多阶段决策问题的代数算法。

sentences.sContent: Through the symbol computer algebra, a fourth order perturbation solution for the one dimentional stable coupled flows of elastic fluids in the deformable porous media.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through the symbol computer algebra, a fourth order perturbation solution for the one dimentional stable coupled flows of elastic fluids in the deformable porous media.
sentences.sCn: 用计算机代数系统进行符号运算，求得了可变形多孔介质中弹性流体一维定常耦合渗流问题的四阶摄动解。

sentences.sContent: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.sCn: 从复变函数理论出发，利用辐角原理、最大模原理、最小模原理给出代数学基本定理的几种新的证明方法。

words.tran: [数] 代数的；关于代数学的

trans.tranOther: a type of mathematics that uses letters and other signs to represent numbers and values
